### Simulating the 4 Aces

```{r}
n <- 1e5
simlist <- rep(NA, n)

for(i in 1:n) {
  deal <- sample(1:52)
  ace_indices <- which(deal %in% 1:4)
  simlist[i] <- if(max(diff(ace_indices)) == 1) 1 else 0
}

mean(simlist)
```


```{r}
n <- 1e5
simlist <- rep(NA, n)

for(i in 1:n) {
  ace_indices <- sample(1:52, size = 4)
  simlist[i] <- if(max(diff(sort(ace_indices))) == 1) 1 else 0
}

mean(simlist)
```
